Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A crystal goblet of $(this.trait:liquid). The smooth bottom of the glass has been etched with three seashells in a circle.

A complex blend of liquors featuring the piney taste typical of gin, the sweetness of vermouth and a bitter, orange spice flavor. The entire drink melds together with the zesty oils of a charred orange peel curl infusing the iced beverage.
